name: shell-ai
description: Shell AI is a simple CLI tool that utilizes Open AI to provide code suggestions directly in your terminal

scripts.dev: export SUGGEST_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/suggest' AUTH_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/auth' REFRESH_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/refresh' SUBSCRIBE_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/subscribe' && npx tsc && npm install -g . && shell-ai suggest 'write a for loop'
scripts.prepack: unset SUGGEST_URL AUTH_URL REFRESH_URL SUBSCRIBE_URL && npx tsc
scripts.prepublish: unset SUGGEST_URL AUTH_URL REFRESH_URL SUBSCRIBE_URL && npx tsc

author: Jack Thomson
